title: Nicky Whelan cosies up with Canadian actor Kyle Schmid in LA
text:
She separated from her husband, retired NFL star Kerry Rhodes, in 2017 after just six months of marriage.

And on Thursday, Nicky Whelan looked happier than ever as she posed with her new beau, Kyle Schmid, at the Genlux Cover Release Party in Los Angeles.

The former Neighbours star, 38, couldn't wipe the smile off her face as she cosied up with the 35-year-old Canadian actor on the red carpet.

Going public! Nicky Whelan (left) cosied up with Canadian actor Kyle Schmid (right) at the Genlux Cover Release Party in LA

Happy in love! Nicky Whelan looked happier than ever as she posed with her new beau shortly after arriving to the event

Nicky looked stylish as she flaunted her endless pins in a beige wrap dress complete with a matching belt and gold collar.

She accessorised her daring ensemble with a pair of black stilettos and a set of gold bangles.

The former Neighbours star kept her golden locks straight and wore a neutral palette of make-up consisting of gold eye shadow and a nude lip.

All smiles! Nicky couldn't wipe the grin off her face as she held hands and posed with Kyle on the red carpet

Strike a pose! The former Neighbours star flaunted her endless pins in a beige wrap dress complete with a matching belt

Meanwhile, Kyle also dressed to impress in a pair of black pants and shirt alongside a stylish leather jacket.

He accessorised his ensemble with a pair of black boots and wore a silver watch on his wrist.

The loved-up couple's appearance comes just two days after they debuted their new relationship in Puerto Rico.

The pair were spotted holding hands and smiling while strolling through Luis Muñoz Marín International Airport on Tuesday.

Striking! Nicky accessorised her daring ensemble with a pair of black stilettos and a set of gold bangles

Glow: She kept her golden locks straight and wore a neutral palette of make-up consisting of a gold eyeshadow and a nude lip

Last year, Nicky said she was forced to 'start her life again' following her split from Kerry in 2017 after six months of marriage.

'I thought that I had lost everything - but in fact I had gained more love for myself than ever before,' she wrote on Instagram at the time.

'This time last year I walked away from my entire life with Yoda [her dog] under my arm. I started my life again at 36.

'I have lost friends - but made hundreds of new ones. I have cried on my knees - but also laughed harder than I ever have in my life.'

It's official! Nicky's appearance comes just two days after she debuted her new relationship in Puerto Rico
